title: Saints Row Reboot at Gamescom?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.20.21
description:
Marvel's Ryan Penagos joins Greg to talk about a Saints Row Reboot, disappointing Madden NFL 22 reviews, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:40 - Housekeeping
We’re doing a sub-a-thon tomorrow @ 11 am PTon twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack.
The Roper Report  -
00:07:35 - Saints Row Could Be Getting a Reboot at Gamescom 2021 - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:19:20 - Skyrim is getting a next-gen upgrade exactly 10 years after its original release - Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:23:23 - Speaking of that, here’s your QuakeCon Report...
00:30:45 - Ad
00:34:20 - Madden NFL 22 Review Round-Up
00:39:22 - WWE 2K22 Screenshots Revealed
00:43:38 - Out today
00:47:25 - Squad Up:Ben Geis(PS5) - bengie12344
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Mon: Bless and Tim
Tues: Greg and Gary @ 9 AM!
Wed: Janet and Andy
Thurs: Greg and Tim
Fri: Greg and Bless
